## Filesystem interface
<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface Filesystem 
```
## Methods

* [fileExists(path)](./php-wasm-node.filesystem.fileexists.md)Checks if a file (or a directory) exists in the PHP filesystem.
* [isDir(path)](./php-wasm-node.filesystem.isdir.md)Checks if a directory exists in the PHP filesystem.
* [listFiles(path)](./php-wasm-node.filesystem.listfiles.md)Lists the files and directories in the given directory.
* [mkdirTree(path)](./php-wasm-node.filesystem.mkdirtree.md)Recursively creates a directory with the given path in the PHP filesystem.
For example, if the path is `/root/php/data`<!-- -->, and `/root` already exists,
it will create the directories `/root/php` and `/root/php/data`<!-- -->.


* [readFileAsBuffer(path)](./php-wasm-node.filesystem.readfileasbuffer.md)Reads a file from the PHP filesystem and returns it as an array buffer.
* [readFileAsText(path)](./php-wasm-node.filesystem.readfileastext.md)Reads a file from the PHP filesystem and returns it as a string.
* [unlink(path)](./php-wasm-node.filesystem.unlink.md)Removes a file from the PHP filesystem.
* [writeFile(path, data)](./php-wasm-node.filesystem.writefile.md)Overwrites data in a file in the PHP filesystem.
Creates a new file if one doesn't exist yet.
